name: HeroCraftAbilities
short_description: HeroCraft Abilities Using the CraftBukkeit Plugin for Minecraft   This is to include Spell casting for wizard type and priest type spells.  These spells are to use spheres and schools to manage classification and to allow restricted use of abilities for game balance.  Ather Abilities will also include turn of the undead, etc.  Mana will be used to manage wizard power and spell casting.  Karma will be used to manage Priest power and spell casting.  All abilities will impact karma in one way or another. .
summary: HeroCraft Abilities Using the CraftBukkeit Plugin
